### convertInitializerTo() {#ad9416a5d82c3490c1066c5ef01b6913a}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Convert to a value whose type is <code>Ty</code>, or return null if this is not possible.

This can happen if the value&#39;s type is convertible to <code>Ty</code>, but there are unresolved references.
